title: client crash when changing Green value in scene properties

content.raw:
When starting gazebo with no arguments, changing the Green value under Scene->Background (increasing it) causes the client to crash like so:



```
#!c++
#0  0x00007fffdf5395c8 in link_shaders(gl_context*, gl_shader_program*) () from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/dri/libglsl.so

    at /tmp/buildd/ros-fuerte-visualization-common-1.8.4/debian/ros-fuerte-visualization-common/opt/ros/fuerte/stacks/visualization_common/ogre/build/ogre_src_v1-7-3/RenderSystems/GL/src/GLSL/src/OgreGLSLLinkProgram.cpp:220
#3  0x00007fffdd7f8881 in Ogre::GLSLLinkProgramManager::getActiveLinkProgram (this=0xc59f80)
    at /tmp/buildd/ros-fuerte-visualization-common-1.8.4/debian/ros-fuerte-visualization-common/opt/ros/fuerte/stacks/visualization_common/ogre/build/ogre_src_v1-7-3/RenderSystems/GL/src/GLSL/src/OgreGLSLLinkProgramManager.cpp:142
#4  0x00007fffdd7f4340 in Ogre::GLSLGpuProgram::bindProgramParameters (this=0x7fffa1c20d00, params=..., mask=65535)

#5  0x00007fffdd7e7e7a in Ogre::GLRenderSystem::bindGpuProgramParameters (this=0x7fffde6b3a58, gptype=<optimized out>, params=..., mask=65535)
    at /tmp/buildd/ros-fuerte-visualization-common-1.8.4/debian/ros-fuerte-visualization-common/opt/ros/fuerte/stacks/visualization_common/ogre/build/ogre_src_v1-7-3/RenderSystems/GL/src/OgreGLRenderSystem.cpp:3084
```
